name: newtab-bm
author: Olivier Cuenot
description: A newtab page replacement that displays the toolbar bookmarks

scripts.webapp:build:firefox: copy-file configs/firefox/index.html webapp/index.html && npm run webapp:build
scripts.webapp:build:chrome: copy-file configs/chrome/index.html webapp/index.html && npm run webapp:build
scripts.prepack: npm run prepack:firefox && npm run prepack:chrome
scripts.prepack:firefox: npm run webapp:build:firefox && npm run clean:firefox && copy-file configs/firefox/manifest.json package/firefox/manifest.json && copy-file LICENSE package/firefox/LICENSE && copy-folder webapp/dist package/firefox && copy-folder icons/ package/firefox/icons
scripts.prepack:chrome: npm run webapp:build:chrome && npm run clean:chrome && copy-file configs/chrome/manifest.json package/chrome/manifest.json && copy-file LICENSE package/chrome/LICENSE && copy-folder webapp/dist package/chrome && copy-folder icons package/chrome/icons
scripts.package: npm run package:firefox && npm run package:chrome
scripts.package:firefox: npm run prepack:firefox && web-ext build --source-dir package/firefox --artifacts-dir package --filename {name}-firefox.xpi --overwrite-dest
scripts.package:chrome: npm run prepack:chrome && web-ext build --source-dir package/chrome --artifacts-dir package --filename {name}-chrome.zip --overwrite-dest
scripts.release: npm run release:firefox && npm run release:chrome
scripts.release:firefox: npm run prepack:firefox && web-ext build --source-dir package/firefox --artifacts-dir releases --filename {name}-{version}-firefox.xpi --overwrite-dest
scripts.release:chrome: npm run prepack:chrome && web-ext build --source-dir package/chrome --artifacts-dir releases --filename {name}-{version}-chrome.zip --overwrite-dest
